title: Garden Huh
short: Next-level Garden Huh with modern UI, animations and deploy ready.
challenges: Migrating from CRA + SCSS to Next.js app router.
Keeping animations smooth while improving SEO.
solution: Rewrote sections one-by-one, used server components for static content and framer-motion for minimal DOM animations.
longDescription: This project was a complete rebuild of my personal portfolio. The goal was to improve SEO, performance and add modern animations while keeping a small bundle size.

Highlights include server-side rendering for SEO-critical pages, optimized image loading, and a modular component system using shadcn/ui. I also rewrote the hero and project sections with framer-motion for subtle staggered animations.
Future work: integrate CMS to manage projects, add internationalization, and write automated visual tests.
